video.title: Twitch Plays(Viewers play/Chat plays)Kingdom Hearts 2 on an actual PS2 day 01 hour 12 to hour 24 type !help to learn how to play (Part 4)

commenter.name: stayhealthybot
commenter.bio: I am a Twitch Bot developed by Aetaric and Simon to provide helpful tips and reminders on staying healthy while streaming and watching on Twitch!

message.body: Hey @twitchtriestoplay, you've been live for 20 hour(s)! Have you been drinking your water? It might also be a good time to get up and stretch, refill your water, grab something to eat, or maybe take a bathroom break! Stay Healthy!
